channel.title: Pages on Syniti Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Syniti Documentation

item.title: Check Table Values
item.description: Check Table Values Use this page to view the values associated with a selected check table while [building a remediation report.](../Use_Cases/Build_a_Remediation_Report.htm) To access this page in dspMigrate: Select Map in the Context bar. Select Configuration > Value Mapping (Config) in Navigation pane. Click the Values icon for a check table. Field Description CHECK TABLE Displays the name of the ERP check table.

item.title: Export Field Mappings
item.description: Export Field Mappings Use this page to [Export a Field Mapping](../Use_Cases/Import_and_Export_Mappings.htm#Export_Mappings). To access this page in dspMigrate: Select Map in the Context bar. Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Sources icon for a Target. Click the Vertical View icon for a Target Source. Click the Export Field Mappings icon in the Page toolbar. Field Descriptions Target

item.title: Field Mapping History
item.description: Field Mapping History Use this page to: - [View Field Mapping History](../Use_Cases/View_Field_Mapping_History.htm) - [Restore Current Field Mapping From History](../Use_Cases/Restore_Current_Field_Mapping_From_History.htm) To access this page in dspMigrate: Select Map in the Context bar. Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Mappings icon for a Target. Select a field and click the History icon in the Page toolbar. Field Description

item.title: Field Mappings H
item.description: Field Mappings H Field Mappings V Use this page to: - [Perform Field Mapping](../Use_Cases/Perform_Field_Mapping.htm) - [Work with Target Sources that have Multi-part Keys](../Use_Cases/Work_with_Sources_with_Multipart_Keys.htm) - [Build a Remediation Report](../Use_Cases/Build_a_Remediation_Report.htm) NOTE: Bulk Execution has been enabled on this page. Refer to Use Bulk Execution for more information. To view all field mappings for the selected Target in Map: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Select Map in the Context bar.

item.title: Field Mappings by Target Field (All Waves)
item.description: Field Mappings by Target Field (All Waves) Field Mappings by Target Field (All Waves) V Use this page to [Copy a Mapping](../Use_Cases/Copy_a_Mapping.htm). To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Select Map in the Context bar. Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Or Click the Targets icon and click the Sources icon for a Target. Click the Mappings icon for a Target or Target Source.

item.title: Import Field Mappings
item.description: Import Field Mappings Use this page to [Import Mappings](../Use_Cases/Import_and_Export_Mappings.htm#Import_a_Mapping_Set). To access this page in dspMigrate: Select Map in the Context bar. Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Sources icon for a Target. Click the Vertical View icon for the Source. Click the Import Field Mappings icon in the Page toolbar. Field Description Import Mappings Click to import mappings from the System Type.

item.title: Legacy Value (Source Table Fields) H
item.description: Legacy Value (Source Table Fields) H Legacy Value (Source Table Fields) V Use this page when [Value Map Target Fields from Multiple Source Systems](../Use_Cases/Value_Map_Target_Fields_from_Mulitple_Source_Systems.htm). To access this page: Select dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Select Map in the Context bar. Select Configuration >Value Mapping (Config) in the Navigation pane. Click the Sources icon for a check table. Click Vertical View for a Source. Click the Source Tables icon.

item.title: Mapping Approval H
item.description: Mapping Approval H Mapping Approval V Use this page to [Approve or Reject Mappings](../Use_Cases/Approve_or_Reject_Mappings.htm). To access this page, click the green Mapping Approval tab on the Quick Panel. Field Description Approve Click to Approve the selected mapping (s). Complete Click to approve the mapping and set the Mapping Status and Rule Status for the selected mapping to Complete.

item.title: Mapping Approvals Download List
item.description: Mapping Approvals Download List Use this page to [Download Mappings for Review](../Use_Cases/Approve_or_Reject_Mappings.htm#Download_Mappings_for_Review). To access this page: Click the Mapping Approvals tab on the Quick Panel. Click the Download List icon in the Page toolbar. Field Description Wave NAME Displays the Wave name of the current context that contains the mapping. Process Area Displays the Process Area name of the current context that contains the mapping.

item.title: Mapping Status
item.description: Mapping Status Use this page to [Configure Mapping Status](../Use_Cases/Mapping_Status_and_Rule_Status.htm#Configure_Mapping_Status_and_Rule_Status). To access this page in dspMigrate: Click Map in the Context bar. Select Configuration > Mapping Status in the Navigation pane. Field Description MAPPING STATUS Displays the name of the status. This field cannot be edited for installed statuses. DESCRIPTION Displays a description of the Mapping Status. This description displays on the hover text over the image on the Field Mappings page’s Horizontal View.

item.title: Metrics and Reports Landing
item.description: Metrics and Reports Landing Use this page to access metrics and reports pages as described below. To access this page in dspMigrate: Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Metrics icon on the Process Area Launch page. Field Description Dashboards Metrics Charts Click to view line graphs of daily, weekly and monthly mapping progress of completed versus total mappings. Snap Shot Stats Metrics Click to open the Target Dashboard Stats page to view Object and Target percentages and sum counts about the mapping status by day, week and month.

item.title: Objects
item.description: Objects Use this page to [view dashboards](../Use_Cases/View_Dashboards_in_Map.htm) at the Object level. To access this page in dspMigrate: Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Objects icon on the Process Area Launch page. Field Description PRIORITY Displays the object priority as set in Console. NAME Displays the name of the Object created in Console and associated with the current context.

item.title: Process Area Launch
item.description: Process Area Launch Use this page to access the pages as described below. To access this page: Click dspMigrate in the Navigation pane Click Map in the Context bar. Field Description Wave Name Displays the Wave added in Console and selected (along with the Process Area) in the Context Menu before accessing Map. Click the link to access the Waves page in Console to view details about the Wave.

item.title: Relationship Fields
item.description: Relationship Fields Use this page to [Add Relationship Joins to Sources.](../Use_Cases/Add_Relationship_Joins_to_Source.htm) To access this page in dspMigrate: Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Sources icon for a Target in the Parent pane. Click the Update Row Sources icon for a Target Source in the Child pane. Click the Secondary Source icon for a Target Source (Add Row) in the Parent pane.

item.title: Relationship Joins H
item.description: Relationship Joins H Relationship Joins V Use this page to [Add Relationship Joins to Sources.](../Use_Cases/Add_Relationship_Joins_to_Source.htm) To access this page: Click dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Sources icon for a Target in the Parent pane. Click the Update Row Sources icon for a Target Source in the Child pane. Click the Secondary Source icon for a Target Source (Add Row) in the Parent pane.

item.title: Rule Status
item.description: Rule Status Use this page to [Configure Rule Status](../Use_Cases/Mapping_Status_and_Rule_Status.htm#Configure_Mapping_Status_and_Rule_Status). To access this page: Click dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Click Map in the Context bar. Select Configuration > Rule Status in the Navigation pane. Field Description RULE STATUS Displays the name of the status. This field cannot be edited for installed statuses. DESCRIPTION Displays a description of the Rule Status.

item.title: Source Check Table (Config) H
item.description: Source Check Table (Config) H Source Check Table (Config) V Use this page when [Value Map Target Fields from Multiple Source Systems](../Use_Cases/Value_Map_Target_Fields_from_Mulitple_Source_Systems.htm). To access this page: Click dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Click Map in the Context bar. Select Configuration > Value Mapping (Config) in the Navigation pane. Click the Sources icon for a check table. Click the Source Config icon for a Source. Field

item.title: Source Value Tracking
item.description: Source Value Tracking Use this page to [View the Source Tables and Fields Mapped to a Lookup Table](../Use_Cases/View_the_Source_Tables_and_Fields_Mapped_to_a_Lookup_Table.htm). To access this page: Click dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Click Map in the Context bar. Select Configuration > Value Mapping (Config) in the Navigation pane. Click the Sources icon for a check table. Click the Vertical View icon for a Source. Click the Source Tables icon. Click the Value Tracking icon.

item.title: Target Dashboard Stats H
item.description: Target Dashboard Stats H Target Dashboard Stats V Use this page to [View Metrics](../Use_Cases/View_Metrics_Map.htm). To access this page: Click dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Metrics icon on the Process Area Launch page Click the Metrics icon on the Metrics and Reports Landing page. Field Description Daily Click to open the Target Metrics Daily page to view a daily snap shot summary of field mappings for the selected Target.

item.title: Target Field Groups
item.description: Target Field Groups Use this page to view Field Groups [registered to the target](../../Design/Use_Cases/Assign_a_Field_Group_to_an_Object.htm). To access this page: Click dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Field Groups icon for a Target Field Description TARGET Displays Target table name where data mapped for the field group will be written.

item.title: Target Metrics Daily H
item.description: Target Metrics Daily H Target Metrics Daily V Use this page to [View Metrics](../Use_Cases/View_Metrics_Map.htm). To access this page: Click dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Metrics icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Metrics icon on the Metrics and Reports Landing page. Click the Daily icon in the Page toolbar. Field Description METRICS TYPE

item.title: Target Metrics Weekly H
item.description: Target Metrics Weekly H Target Metrics Weekly V Use this page to [View Metrics](../Use_Cases/View_Metrics_Map.htm). To access this page: Click dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Metrics icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Metrics icon on the Metrics and Reports Landing page. Click the Weekly icon in the Page toolbar. Field Description METRICS TYPE

item.title: Target Rule Copy To
item.description: Target Rule Copy To Use this page to [Copy All Target Rules to Another Target](../Use_Cases/Copy_All_Target_Rules_To_Another_Target.htm). To access this page: Click dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Targetsicon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Sources icon for a Target. Click Vertical View for a Target Source. Click the Copy To icon on the Page toolbar. Field

item.title: Target Source Copy To
item.description: Target Source Copy To Use this page to [Copy a Target Source to Another Target](../Use_Cases/Copy_a_Target_Source_to_Another_Target.htm). To access this page: Click dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Targetsicon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Sources icon for a Target. Click Vertical View for a Target Source. Click the Copy To icon on the Page toolbar. Field

item.title: Target Source Rule Book
item.description: Target Source Rule Book Use this page to [View All Mappings for a Target](../Use_Cases/View_all_Mappings_for_a_Target.htm). To access this page: Click dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Metrics icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Rule Book icon on the Metrics and Reports Landing page. Field Description NAME Displays the name of the object as created in Console.

item.title: Target Source Schema H
item.description: Target Source Schema H Target Source Schema V Use this page to [Reset Target Source Schema Field Lengths](../Use_Cases/Reset_Target_Source_Schema_Field_Lengths.htm). To access this page: Click dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Sources icon for a Target. Click the Vertical View icon for a Target Source. Click the Schema Columns icon on the Target Sources page.

item.title: Target Sources (Add Row)
item.description: Target Sources (Add Row) Use this page while: - [Add Update Row Sources that are Views](../Use_Cases/Add_Update_Row_Sources.htm#Add_Update_Row_Sources_that_are_Views) - [Add Update Row Sources that are Tables](../Use_Cases/Add_Update_Row_Sources.htm#Add_Update_Row_Sources_that_are_Tables) - [Adding an External Source](../Use_Cases/Add_an_External_Source.htm) To access this page: Click dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Sources icon for a Target. Click the Update Row Sources icon for a Source.

item.title: Target Sources (Update Row) H
item.description: Target Sources (Update Row) H Target Sources (Update Row) V Use this page to: - [Add Add Row Sources](../Use_Cases/Add_an_Add_Row_Source.htm) - [Add Update Row Sources](../Use_Cases/Add_Update_Row_Sources.htm) - [Add an External Source](../Use_Cases/Add_an_External_Source.htm) - [Add Relationship Joins to Sources](../Use_Cases/Add_Relationship_Joins_to_Source.htm) To access this page: Click dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Sources icon for a Target.

item.title: Target Sources H
item.description: Target Sources H Target Sources V Use this page to: - [Set a Source Database Object](../Use_Cases/Perform_Field_Mapping.htm#Set_a_Source_Database_Object) - [Add ZActive Fields](../Use_Cases/Add_ZActive.htm) - [Update Client and Language for all Sources](../Use_Cases/Update_Client_and_Language_for_all_Sources.htm) To access this page: Click dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Sources icon for a Target. Field Description

item.title: Targets H
item.description: Targets H Targets V Use this page to: - [Sync Map and Target Design](../../Design/Use_Cases/Sync_Map_and_Target_Design_TD.htm) - [Build a Remediation Report](../Use_Cases/Build_a_Remediation_Report.htm) To access this page: Click dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Targets icon on the Process Area Launch page. Field Description Sync From Target Design Click to sync Map with Target Design, updating tables, fields, Sources and lookup tables.

item.title: Targets Metrics Monthly H
item.description: Targets Metrics Monthly H Target Metrics Monthly V Use this page to [View Metrics](../Use_Cases/View_Metrics_Map.htm). To access this page: Click dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Metricsicon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Metrics icon on the Metrics and Reports Landing page. Click the Monthly icon in the Page toolbar. Field Description METRICS TYPE

item.title: User Track Changes
item.description: User Track Changes Use this page to [Set up Notifications](../Config/Setup_User_Notifications.htm#Set_up_Notifications_for_Map_Updates). To access this page: Click dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Click Map in the Context bar. Select Configuration > User Track Changes in the Navigation pane. Field Description USER ID Displays the user name requesting to receive information when changes occur to field mappings, value mappings, or table and rule creation.

item.title: Value Mapping
item.description: Value Mapping Use this page to [Perform Value Mapping](../Use_Cases/Perform_Value_Mapping_Overview.htm). To access this page: Click dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Value Mapping icon on the Process Area Launch page. Field Description Auto Map by Description Click to automatically map the Target value to a Source value by comparing the legacy description to the Target description.

item.title: Value Mapping (Config) H
item.description: Value Mapping (Config) H Value Mapping (Config) V Use this page to [Build a Remediation Report](../Use_Cases/Build_a_Remediation_Report.htm). To access this page: Click dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Click Map in the Context bar. Select Configuration > Value Mapping (Config) in Navigation pane. Field Description Target Lookup Table (Config) Click to open the Target Lookup Table page to update configuration for a check table as needed.

item.title: Value Mapping (Legacy to Target) H
item.description: Value Mapping (Legacy to Target) H Value Mapping (Legacy to Target) V Use this page to - [Perform Value Mapping](../Use_Cases/Perform_Value_Mapping_Overview.htm) - [Value Map Target Fields from Multiple Source Systems](../Use_Cases/Value_Map_Target_Fields_from_Mulitple_Source_Systems.htm) To access this page: Click dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Value Mapping icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Values icon for a check table.

item.title: Value Mapping (Sources) H
item.description: Value Mapping (Sources) H Value Mapping (Sources) V Use this page to [Perform Value Mapping](../Use_Cases/Perform_Value_Mapping_Overview.htm). To access this page: Click dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Value Mapping icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Mappings icon for a check table. Click the check table name link in the LOOKUP column on the Field Mappings page next to a mapping with Xref or RuleXref action.

item.title: Wave Gate Metrics (Value Mapping) H
item.description: Wave Gate Metrics (Value Mapping) H Wave Gate Metrics (Value Mapping) V Use this page to [View Metrics](../Use_Cases/View_Metrics_Map.htm). To access this page: Click dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Metrics icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click the Gate Value Mapping icon on the Metrics and Reports Landing page. Field Description NAME Displays the Wave name.

item.title: Wave Lookup Table Refresh
item.description: Wave Lookup Table Refresh Use this page to [Refresh Target and Legacy Values](../Use_Cases/Refresh_Target_and_Legacy_Values.htm). To access this page: Click dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Click Map in the Context bar. Select Configuration > Wave Lookup Table Refresh in Navigation pane. Field Description Refresh Target Values Click to refresh values into check tables. Refresh Legacy Values Click to refresh Legacy Source tables and fields marked as active for the Source and the Source field.

item.title: Wave Process Area Gate Metrics (Field Mapping) H
item.description: Wave Process Area Gate Metrics (Field Mapping) H Wave Process Area Gate Metrics (Field Mapping) V Use this page to [View Metrics](../Use_Cases/View_Metrics_Map.htm). To access this page: Click dspMigrate in the Navigation pane. Click Map in the Context bar. Click the Metrics icon on the Process Area Launch page. Click theGate Field Mapping icon on the Metrics and Reports Landing page. Field Description GATE NAME
